name: Boom Shrooms
description:
In nature, there are creatures known as Boom Shrooms, who are destined to explode shortly after they are born to spread their spores. Not all of them want to go without a fight...

And others, like yourself, couldn't care less. There's a reason you're called Lazy Shroom: You just want some peace and quiet. But Panic Shroom, who wants to escape his fiery fate, and Manic Shroom, who is eagerly looking forward to it, just won't leave you alone. Link up with your friends and to help them achieve what they want so they will finally leave you alone.

Controls:

Left/Right - Movement

Space - Jump

Left Mouse + Drag - Create Link

Right Mouse - Break Link

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 gamejam.
